Hello again! 
I will now teach you another key feature: combining gems 
The combined gems are more powerful than regular gems 
So, how do we combine gems?

With --display-- nodes 
They accept gems like gates, but unlike regular nodes, they can hold 2 gems at once 
 By connecting two nodes to a display, you can see how it will combine 
Allow me to demonstrate

Did you see how the gems were combined into a new gem entirely? 
Now you try!
